### RCMP PC12 Aircraft Lease Solicitation

#### Issued on August 25, 2023

The [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/fr) (ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)) invites proposals from qualified entities for a competitive lease of a Pilatus PC12/47E aircraft for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

**Overview**

The RCMP Air Services seeks to lease a Pilatus PC12/47E aircraft for an initial period of two years, with three one-year option periods. The chosen vendor will be responsible for providing a single aircraft, compatible with RCMP requirements, for exclusive use.

**Key Requirements**

*   Initial lease period: 2 years
*   Option periods: 3 one-year periods
*   Leased aircraft must meet RCMP specifications

**Proposal Guidelines**

Only proposals submitted electronically via the Ariba Discovery platform will be considered. Suppliers must register with the platform and follow the instructions in the notification to access the solicitation package. Bid formulations must include:
    
    *   A signed and dated copy of the most current General Conditions for Leasing Aircraft for the RCMP
    *   Proof of vendor qualifications and experience
    *   Vendor application form with required documentation

**Evaluation Criteria**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the vendor at the required deadline. Proposals submitted after the deadline will be deemed non-compliant.

**Closing Information**

The closing information for this solicitation has been updated:
    
    *   Closes: 2023-09-26 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
    *   Deemed non-compliant after: 14:00:00 EST on 2023-09-26

**Contact Information**

To inquire about this solicitation, please contact Ashley Kazda (ASHLEY.KAZDA@Tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
